original_text: Then I saw another angel who was flying high in the sky above me. He brought God's message of good news that is always true. He came to tell this news to everyone who lives on the earth. He would tell it to people from every nation, from every tribe and from every language.
korean_text: 또 보니 다른 천사가 공중에 날아가는데 땅에 거주하는 자들 곧 모든 민족과 종족과 방언과 백성에게 전할 영원한 복음을 가졌더라

sentences.original_text: who was flying high in the sky above me
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 내 위 하늘 높이 날고 있었고

sentences.original_text: He brought God's message of good news
He came to tell this news to everyone
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 이 소식을 모두에게 전하기 위해 왔고

sentences.original_text: He would tell it to people from every nation
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 모든 나라 사람들에게 말할 것이며

sentences.original_text: from every tribe and from every language
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 족속과 모든 언어에서 온 사람들에게
